main_page_advertiser.why_title: Why is it more effective with us?

stages.stage: Найти подходящие площадки вручную
Проверить каждую площадку на накрутку и качество аудитории
Узнать у админов стоимость, условия и свободные времена размещения
Оплатить отдельно каждому админу размещение без каких либо гарантий средств
Отправить рекламный пост каждому админу
Следить за размещением поста в каждой площадке отдельно
Зарегистрируйте аккаунт на платформе
Подберите подходящие плошадки в пару кликов или выберите запуск под ключ
Пополните баланс удобным способом
Загрузите пост либо сгенерируйте все с помощью искусственного интеллекта
В один клик запустите рекламу сразу во всех выбранных площадках
Получайте оповещение о каждом размещении
Платформа гарантирует сохранность ваших средств пока не будут выполнены все условия размещения

main_page_advertiser.customers_title: What our clients say about us:

customers_list.name: Kadmov Roman
customers_list.text: Advertising sales on this marketplace are a real find! An excellent platform for brand promotion. Transparent deal conditions, effective client interaction, and high-quality analytics. I recommend it to anyone looking to increase their business visibility.

customers_list.name: Karimov Damir
customers_list.text: Very satisfied with the results of working on this marketplace. Advertising sales here are not only an effective way to attract new customers but also a pleasant experience with a professional support team. The platform provides unique opportunities for scaling ad campaigns.

customers_list.name: Khamidov Mardonbek
customers_list.text: This marketplace has become a reliable partner for me in the field of advertising sales. An intuitive interface, extensive targeting options, and excellent visibility of results. Working with it has been a key element of my advertising strategy. Thank you for the excellent service!

customers_list.name: customer 1
customers_list.text: Advertising sales on this marketplace are a real find! An excellent platform for brand promotion. Transparent deal conditions, effective client interaction, and high-quality analytics. I recommend it to anyone looking to increase their business visibility.

how_list.stage: Add your channel to our platform
Publish a post on your channel at the specified time and receive payment from the advertiser

main_page_blogger.why_title: Why is it more effective with us?

stages.stage: Find suitable platforms manually
Check each platform for fake audience and quality
Find out the price, terms, and available times from admins
Pay each admin separately for placement without any guarantees
Send the advertising post to each admin
Track the placement of the post on each platform separately
Register an account on the platform
Select suitable platforms in a few clicks or choose turnkey launch
Top up your balance conveniently
Upload a post or generate everything using AI
Launch advertising in all selected platforms in one click
Receive notifications about each placement
The platform guarantees the safety of your funds until all placement conditions are met

delete_channel.title: Are you sure you want to delete the channel?

deactivate_channel.title: Are you sure you want to deactivate the channel? All active orders linked to this channel will be automatically rejected. If you have unfinished orders with this channel, we recommend completing them, receiving the funds, and then deactivating the channel.

active.title: Submit the post link
active.send_link_title: Submit the link to the published ad post
active.send_link_subtitle: Before submitting the link, please ensure that all advertiser requirements have been fully met

check.title: You have submitted the post
check.text: After the order period ends or upon advertiser confirmation, payment will be transferred to your account

wait.title: New Order
wait.text: You must make a decision within 24 hours, otherwise, the order will be automatically declined

cancel.title: Order Rejected
cancel.text: Please note that frequent order cancellations may lower your rating

moderation.text: The order does not meet the requirements of the Blogix platform. Please wait for the administrator's decision

reject.title: Order Canceled
reject.text: The decision was made in favor of the advertiser

info.title: Select a Platform
info.text: Choose the platform where your channel is hosted.

link.title: Enter the Link
link.text: Provide a link to your channel, ensuring the correct format.
link.verification: Important! Place the specified code in the description of your channel, this is needed to confirm ownership of the channel. After successful verification, you can delete this code.

category.title: Select a Category
category.text: You can select only one category that best represents your channel's content.

languages.title: Select Language
languages.text: You can select one or more languages in which content is published on your channel.

region.title: Select Region
region.text: You can select one or more regions where your main audience is located.

sex.title: Gender Ratio, %
sex.text: Select the percentage distribution of men and women in your audience.

age.title: Select Audience Age
age.text: You can select one or more age groups that dominate your audience.

description.title: Channel Description
description.default_value: Describe the features that make your channel stand out.
description.text: Describe your channel, its main goals, and unique features. Specify its main topic, the predominant content types, and what makes it different from other channels.

price.title: Choose Placement Format and Specify Price
price.info: You can learn about placement format differences and pricing guidelines in the instructions.
price.text: Select a placement format and specify the corresponding price for the chosen option.

symbol.title: Number of Characters in Post
symbol.text: Specify the number of characters in the post you are willing to publish, including spaces and punctuation marks.

create.moderation: Your channel addition request has been sent for moderator review.

current_password.title: Current Password
current_password.description: Enter your current password to confirm the changes.

new_password.title: New Password
new_password.description: Enter a new password that will be used to sign in to your account. The password must be strong and contain at least 8 characters, including letters and numbers.

accept_password.title: Confirm New Password
accept_password.description: Re-enter the new password to confirm it. Make sure both entered passwords match.

bot.title: Telegram Bot
bot.enable_notifications: Do you want to connect a Telegram bot for notifications?
bot.instruction: Read more detailed instructions on setting up the Telegram bot

name.title: Full Name
name.description: Enter your full name as stated in your passport or another official document. Ensure that the data matches your bank information.

registration_number.title: Registration Number
registration_number.description: Enter your registration number assigned during the registration process. This number is used for identification and verification.

registration_date.title: Registration Date
registration_date.description: Enter your registration date in the format DD.MM.YYYY. Ensure the data matches your official documents.

error.required: invalid format, enter in the format dd.mm.yyyy: 22.09.2023

PNFL.title: PNFL
PNFL.description: Personal Identification Number for individuals. Enter a valid PNFL as it is required for data verification.

entity.title: Company Name
entity.description: Enter the full official name of your company as per registration documents. This is required for proper payment processing and documentation.

address.title: Legal Address
address.description: Enter the registered address of your company. It may differ from the actual business location but must match the registration documents.

INN.title: Taxpayer Identification Number (INN)
INN.description: Enter your company's or individual entrepreneur's Taxpayer Identification Number (INN). This number is used for tax accounting and organization identification.

individual.title: Individual Entrepreneur Name
individual.description: Enter the full name of the individual entrepreneur as stated in the registration documents. This name is used for identification in legal and financial documents.

bank_mfo.title: Bank MFO
bank_mfo.description: Enter the bank's interbranch turnover code (MFO) where your account is opened. This code is used for payment processing.

bank_name.title: Bank Name
bank_name.description: Enter the official name of the bank where your account is opened. This is important for proper crediting of funds to your account.

checking_account.title: Checking Account
checking_account.description: Enter the checking account number opened in your name or your company's name at the bank. This account is used for fund transfers and other financial transactions.

transit_account.title: Transit Account
transit_account.description: Enter your transit account number if required for transferring funds. This account is used for payment processing and may differ from your checking account.

card_number.title: Card Details
card_number.description: Enter your bank card number without spaces. Be careful when entering, as an incorrect number may result in payment rejection.

card_date.title: Card Expiry Date
card_date.description: Enter your card's expiry date in the format MM/YY (month/year). This information is required for transaction processing and card validation.

phone.title: Phone Number
phone.description: Enter your active phone number in international format. This number may be used for communication and payment confirmation.

error.required: enter phone number in the correct format

email.title: E-mail
email.description: Enter your valid email address. Notifications about payment status and other important messages may be sent to this email.

accept.text1: I confirm the accuracy of the data, I have read and accept the

platform.match_description: The match percentage indicates how well this channel fits the selected search parameters

ai.title: Describe your advertising campaign. The more details you provide about your goals, the more effectively target audiences will be selected for you.
ai.default_input: Tell us about your brand and the product you plan to advertise.

create_post.title: Order is protected by a secure transaction
create_post.text: The channel owner will receive payment only after your confirmation of successful placement

check.amount: The project exceeds the final amount
check.no_data: No information available for this project

amount.title: Top-up Amount
amount.description: Enter the amount to top up your balance. Minimum amount is 50,000 UZS. Maximum amount is 1,000,000,000 UZS.

success.title: Your request has been successfully processed!
success.text: Please carefully specify the payment details and purpose exactly as indicated in the invoice. This is necessary for the correct and quick crediting of funds. Once the funds are received in the specified account, your balance will be updated.

amount.title: Withdrawal Amount
amount.description: Enter the amount to withdraw from your balance. Minimum amount is 50,000 UZS. Maximum amount is 1,000,000,000 UZS.

success.title: Your request has been successfully processed!
success.text: Your advance withdrawal request has been successfully submitted. Please wait for confirmation and the receipt of funds shortly.

topup.title: How to Top Up the Organization's Balance
topup.description: Follow these simple steps to top up your organization's balance through the Blogix system

steps.title: Authorization in didox.uz
steps.description: Log in using your digital signature. After successful authorization, all your organization's details will be filled in automatically.

steps.title: Enter Top-Up Amount
steps.description: Specify the amount you want to top up your wallet with.

steps.title: Invoice Creation
steps.description: After entering the amount and submitting the request, an invoice will be automatically generated.

steps.title: Pay the Invoice via Your Bank
steps.description: Transfer the specified amount using the invoice details from your organization's bank account to the Blogix platform account.

steps.title: Funds Crediting
steps.description: As soon as the bank confirms the transfer, the funds will be automatically credited to your wallet.

steps.title: Top-Up Notification
steps.description: You will receive a notification via email and within the platform that the balance has been successfully topped up.

note.title: Important Information
note.description: Payment processing may take from several minutes to several hours depending on your bank. If the funds do not arrive within 24 hours, please contact support.

withdraw.title: How to Withdraw Money from the Platform
withdraw.description: Follow these simple steps to withdraw funds from the platform via the Blogix system

steps.title: Select Wallet for Withdrawal
steps.description: Specify which wallet you want to withdraw funds from:

substeps.title: Deposit Wallet
substeps.description: Used for returning previously deposited funds.
substeps.info: The return is processed as an official letter through Didox

substeps.title: Profit Wallet
substeps.info: No document processing required, funds are withdrawn automatically.

steps.title: Authorization in didox.uz
steps.description: Log in using your digital signature. After successful authorization, all your organization's details will be filled in automatically.

steps.title: Specify Withdrawal Amount
steps.description: Enter the amount you want to withdraw to your organization's bank account.

steps.title: Funds Transfer
steps.description: The funds will be transferred to your organization's bank account.

steps.title: Withdrawal Notification
steps.description: You will receive a notification via email and within the platform that the funds have been successfully withdrawn.

note.title: Important Information
note.description: Payment processing may take from several minutes to several hours depending on your bank. If the funds do not arrive within 24 hours, please contact support.

info_card.text: Adding an organization is necessary for document processing, receiving payments to a settlement account (card), and participating in advertising campaigns on behalf of a legal entity, IE, or self-employed. This is important for transparency, trust, and proper document flow through our partner Didox. If you have difficulties, we recommend reading the detailed guide at the link
info_card.link: How to add an organization and why is it needed?

didox.text: After clicking the 'Confirm' button, you will be redirected to the Didox website to sign the public offer. After successful confirmation, your organization will be added and saved on the platform.

not_found.title: not found in the Didox system
not_found.text: To continue, you need to register the self-employed in Didox. Click 'Register' and go through the registration process. If you have questions, we recommend reading the detailed guide:
not_found.link: How to register in Didox if I am self-employed?

name.title: Full name

entity.title: Company name

address.title: Legal address

INN.title: INN
INN.description: Enter the taxpayer identification number (INN) of your company or individual entrepreneur. This number is used for tax accounting and organization identification.

individual.title: IE name

bank_name.title: Bank name

checking_account.title: Checking account

transit_account.title: Transit account
transit_account.description: Enter your transit account number if required for transferring funds. This account is used for payment processing and may differ from your checking account.
